definition: Nyeva or Neva River (through St Petersburg)
to blacken/abbr. for 涅槃[nie4 pan2]
roof tile/abbr. for 瓦特[wa3 te4]

sentences.english: People look at fountains on the Neva River in central St. Petersburg August 11, 2006.
sentences.chinese: 俄罗斯圣彼得堡中心的居民看著涅瓦河上的喷泉。

sentences.english: Opposite the museum, on the other side of the river Neva, is St Peter's Church.
sentences.chinese: 博物馆对面，涅瓦河的另一边，是圣彼得堡大教堂。

sentences.english: Biggest and long time customers of the company include Bonn and NEVA.
sentences.chinese: 该公司最大的长期客户包括波恩和涅瓦河。

sentences.english: The Neva River flows through the center of St Petersburg in Russia.
sentences.chinese: 涅瓦河从俄罗斯的圣彼德堡市中心流过。

sentences.english: Shortly after the dawn, a pilot embayed us in the Neva River.
sentences.chinese: 不久之后天微亮时，一名引水员把我们带进了涅瓦河。

sentences.english: Tour boats on the Neva River outside the Hermitage.
sentences.chinese: 某修道院外的涅瓦河上的游船。

definition: Zolotoy Rog or Golden Horn Bay in Vladivostok (famous for its pollution)

pinyin: Sai1 wa3 si1 tuo1 bo1 er3

definition: the Nyeva or Neva river (through St Petersburg)
Sava River, flowing through Southeast Europe
Tiber (river in Italy, the main watercourse of Rome)
